text: She was sending a thought - provoking message about love and peace. And Katy Perry reinforced it with her choice of dress when she hit the stage at the Old Trafford Cricket Ground, in Manchester on Sunday for Ariana Grande's One Love Manchester benefit gig. The songstress, 32, looked ethereal in a feathered wrap, but when she discarded the cover - up her poignant tribute to the 22 victims of the May terror attack was revealed, with the star wearing their photos on her white mini dress.
